subject: Top listed medications 4 you
body:
Dear customer.
Various medical associations warn us about the growing problem of drug falsification. If you want to know how to avoid being sold fake medications, red this letter to the end.
The more attention you pay to your health, the more expensive it is. However, CanadianPharmacy has got something to help you with. We've got the best prices on high-quality generic medications here plus shipping discounts. CanadianPharmacy the only reliable drugstore on the Web.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Yours faithfully,Frances Mccabe
